document.heading: Life and Health Insurance Guaranty Association Consumer Protection Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-130, the “Life and Health Insurance Guaranty Association Consumer Protection Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-212. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 8, 2014, and May 6, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 4, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-347 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-130 became effective on July 23, 2014.
